text: Derick Omar Sequeira Lara (born 20 January 1996) is a Canadian-born Nicaraguan footballer who plays as a midfielder. ==International career== Sequeira was born in Canada to Nicaraguan parents.Derick Sequeira's profile on CanadaSoccer.com. Retrieved 22 April 2017. He was a youth international for Canada. He was formally capped by the Nicaragua national football team in a friendly 3-0 loss to Guatemala on 14 August 2014. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Mississauga Category:Soccer people from Ontario Category:Canadian people of Nicaraguan descent Category:Canadian soccer players Category:Nicaraguan footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Toronto FC Senior Academy players Category:Canada men's youth international soccer players Category:Nicaragua international footballers
title: Derick Sequeira
